Hi Group,

Sorry if this is a little off topic, but I thought people may be interested

There is a kogatana making course that takes place outside Tokyo. You can 
experience making your own kogatana under the guidance of a licensed 
Japanese swordsmith. I have attached a flyer, please feel free to pass them 
to your respective clubs.

Best

Paul
